bookTitle: The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency Collection
Plot: Contains No's 1-4 in the No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency series; THE NO. 1 LADIES' DETECTIVE AGENCY; TEARS OF THE GIRAFFE; MORALITY FOR BEAUTIFUL GIRLS; THE KALAHARI TYPING SCHOOL FOR MEN.
Characters: Precious Ramotswe, Silvia Potokwani, Charlie the older apprentice, Mr. J.L.B. Matekoni, Violet Sepotho, Grace Makutsi, Fanwell the younger apprentice, Obed Ramotswe
